mapper.select: SELECT a.lc_code FROM wms_location a LEFT outer JOIN (SELECT warehouse_code,lc_code,lc_type FROM wms_inventory) as b ON a.lc_code=b.lc_code where b.lc_code IS NULL AND a.lc_type = 'Z' GROUP BY a.lc_code ORDER BY ABS(CONVERT(replace(replace(a.lc_code,'Z',''),'-',''), SIGNED)-#{lcCode}) LIMIT 1;
